price: Na tukitaka tunawazamisha, wala hapana wa kuwasaidia, wala hawaokolewi,
arabic: وَإِن نَّشَأۡ نُغۡرِقۡهُمۡ فَلَا صَرِيخَ لَهُمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يُنقَذُونَ
footnotes: Na tukitaka kuwazamisha, tunawazamisha. Na wala hawapati wa kuwaopoa, wala hawapati wa kuwaokoa wasiangamie.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-in nasha nugh'riq'hum falā ṣarīkha lahum walā hum yunqadhūna
translations: (would be) a responder to a cry
